Docs.summary: Represents a collection of objects.

remarks.format:
## Remarks All objects which derive from <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> have a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBindingCollection> named
<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.CommandBindings%2A>.
## Examples The following example creates a <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBinding> and adds it to the <xref:System.Windows.Input.CommandBindingCollection> of a <xref:System.Windows.Window>.
